subject: Perl Conferences and Workshops
header: as I was preparing this edition of the Perl Weekly I suddenly realized that I've hardly heard any news about The Perl Conference that used to be YAPC::NA.
The only event I found on the YAPC EU page, my usual source, was the YAPC Europe August 9 - 11, 2017 Amsterdam, Netherlands.
After some search I've also found the French Perl Workshop June 9-10, 2017, Paris, France.
Is YAPC::NA going to take place? Are there other Perl Workshops being organized? Let us know and we can help to get the word out!
